title: Journey Orchestration Step Event Action Execution Fields
description: This Mixin will have Journey Action Metadata Fields

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Journey Orchestration for creating user journey.

journey:actionId.title: actionId
journey:actionId.description: Id of the action that is being executed

journey:actionName.title: actionName
journey:actionName.description: Name of the action If no name has been set, the stepName will be taken

journey:actionParameterized.title: actionParameterized
journey:actionParameterized.description: Indicates if the action is parameterized or not

journey:actionExecutionTime.title: actionExecutionTime
journey:actionExecutionTime.description: The amount of time (in milliseconds) taken to execute a current action

journey:actionExecutionError.title: actionExecutionError
journey:actionExecutionError.description: Type of error that happens when the action is called.

journey:actionExecutionErrorCode.title: actionExecutionErrorCode
journey:actionExecutionErrorCode.description: Code for action execution error. Present if the error has a code, such as an HTTP one

journey:actionExecutionOriginError.title: actionExecutionOriginError
journey:actionExecutionOriginError.description: This Field tells about the timeout errors during retry for a Journey Action, such as HTTP,Capping

journey:actionBusinessType.title: actionBusinessType
journey:actionBusinessType.description: What type of action it is. It could be ACS, Business  Action, SMS etc.

journey:deliveryJobId.title: deliveryJobId
journey:deliveryJobId.description: This describes the deliveryJobId for the batch Journey

journey:batchDeliveryId.title: batchDeliveryId
journey:batchDeliveryId.description: This describes the deliveryId for the batch Journey

journey:isFromSegmentTrigger.title: deliveryJobId
journey:isFromSegmentTrigger.description: This describes if the Batch Journey triggered from Audisence Segment

journey:actionSchedulerCount.title: actionSchedulerCount
journey:actionSchedulerCount.description: count of scheduler notification requests sent to the scheduler service during the step processing
